UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: Jasmine works for a Honda dealership. Jasmine has spent considerable time listening to a potential customer talk about what features they are looking for in a new car. Jasmine is able to identify the best Honda automobile to meet the needs of the customer. What feature of sales is Jasmine demonstrating?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Personal communication is only one aspect that Jasmine has demonstrated. She has also demonstrated others.
That’s not correct. Meeting a customer’s needs and wants is only one aspect that Jasmine has demonstrated. She has also demonstrated others.
That’s not correct. One-on-one interaction is only one aspect that Jasmine has demonstrated. She has also demonstrated others.

answers.text: All of these features are correct.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Jasmine has effectively demonstrated the personal selling skills of one-on-one interaction with the customer, meeting the needs and wants of the customer, and having personal communication with the customer to satisfy their needs and wants.

detailedSolution: Jasmine has effectively demonstrated the personal selling skills of one-on-one interaction with the customer, meeting the needs and wants of the customer, and having personal communication with the customer to satisfy their needs and wants.
